import React, { Fragment, useContext } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { StateHandler } from "../../../StateHandler"; function ProductItem({ product, isAdmin, addCart }) { return (
{isAdmin && }
{product.title}

Description: {product.description}

  • Price: ${product.price}
{isAdmin ? (
Edit
Delete
) : (
addCart(product)} > Buy
View
)}
); } export default ProductItem;
